attributes.agent_name: Grand Central Motors Jeep Fiat Alfa Romeo Midrand
attributes.description: Finance Can Be Arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point Quality Check. Very Neat. Tradeins Accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide Delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylormade deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Grand Central Motors Jeep, Fiat Alfa Romeo

attributes.description: HIS CAR STAND OUT FROM THE AVERAGE. Such a stunning vehicle, perfectly original and immaculate in every way IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A CLEANER ONE IN THIS PRICE RANGE full service history, every service completed on schedule and up to date, Candy White, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim, THIS IS THE TOP OF THE RANGE SX SPORT SPEC WHICH COMES FULLY LOADED WITH EVERY EXTRA AND LUXURY INCLUDING Full Leather Package, Multi Functional Sport Leather Steering with Paddle shift Gearchange, Cruise Control, Automatic Climate Control, Park Distance Control Front and Rear, Beautiful 17 Light Alloy wheels, Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety Film etc etc. Perfectly looked after and maintained by responsible previous owner, Amazing 2.0 Liter Petrol engine offers brilliant power, SUCH A PLEASURE TO DRIVE IN AUTOMATIC, economical and simple to maintain. EXTREMELY LIGHT ON FUEL You simply cannot find a better value spacious AUTOMATIC with GOOD MILEAGE and comprehensive service history available in this price range, must be seen to be appreciated. DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
attributes.title: 2011 Kia Cerato 2.0 Auto

attributes.description: One owner since new, Full service history, every service completed on schedule and up to date, including service recently completed WHICH EQUALS 100 PEACE OF MIND . Arctic White with black leather and red stitching, finished with satin silver trim and chrome line exterior, such a stunning combination. THE TITANIUM SPEC OF THESE VEHICLES IS JUST SO MUCH MORE IMPRESSIVE THAN THE LOWER TREND AND AMBIENTE VERSIONS OF THE ECOSPORT Loaded with all the standard extras and additional TITANIUM extras including Multi functional leather steering wheel, Full leather package, Automatic headlights and rain sensor, Climate control air conditioning, Bluetooth Audio and Phone Connectivity, USB and Aux. ports ISOFIX child seat package, Cruise Control, Towbar, Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety film etc. etc. Perfectly looked after and maintained by fanatical previous owner. 4 TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION Amazing 1.5L Diesel engine offers brilliant power, CRAZY LIGHT ON FUEL, SO DIFFICULT TO FIND A TOP OF THE RANGE DIESEL S.U.V WITH EXISTING FACTORY WARRANTY AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE Must be seen to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE

attributes.description: At AutoCity Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. And we go out of our way to ensure we deliver to the standards you would expect. We design a package around your budget. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Optional Warranty and Service plans available. Tradeins will be considered. Ts Cs Apply. EOE.
